unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a serious issue for our farmers in Punjab. Heard many using too much after 20/07/2023. Maybe Krishi Vigyan Kendra should do more awareness programs, like the one they did on 10/10/2022. Remember the BT cotton fiasco? We need sustainable methods, not just quick fixes. What do you think, around 14:00 hrs farmers will listen? Jai Kisan!
normalised: "Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a serious issue for our farmers in Punjab. Heard many using too much after twentieth july two thousand and twenty three. Maybe Krishi Vigyan Kendra should do more awareness programs, like the one they did on tenth october two thousand and twenty two. Remember the B T cotton fiasco? We need sustainable methods, not just quick fixes. What do you think, around two P M farmers will listen? Jai Kisan!"
